name: Grayscaled
description:
Move your finger around the screen to move the white dot and stay away from the Dark shades. What is your best score?

Enjoy the game.

Features:

▶ MANOEUVRE around avoiding spikes, walls, and balls

▶ ENDLESS twists and turns: Play forever and try to beat your friend's top score with Game Center!

▶ FREE download plus everything can be earned easily without any purchases (in-app purchase optional)

▶ iOS 11.x and iPhone X supported!
